quotes.quote: No woman ever gets given a fur coat for good reasons; if it's not to keep her on her back, it's to get her off his.

Fur is not murder, but it is quite expensive.
A man does not buy his wife a fur coat to keep her warm, but to keep her pleasant.
Fur only looks good on its original owner. Be comfortable in your own skin, and let animals keep theirs.
Finest fur may cover toughest meat.
There is no moral distinction between fur and other materials made from animals, such as leather, which also is the result of the suffering and death of sentient beings.
Never buy a fur from a vegetarian.
There is no morally coherent difference between fur and other animal clothing, such as leather, wool, etc., just as there is no morally coherent distinction between meat and milk or eggs.
Fur used to turn heads, now it turns stomachs.
There is no need for fur - since there are compassionate alternatives.
Abuse yourself all you want - just leave animals out of it. Don't wear fur.

There's always a way to wear fur.
